title: Anemone in the Abyss
description:
The painting ‘Anemone in the Abyss’ by Flori Bulduș is part of the ‘Harmony of the Sea’
 series and is an underwater exploration of the harmony and diversity of marine life.

This vibrant and colorful work features anemones and
other sea creatures coexisting in perfect harmony in the depths of the sea.

With various shades of blue and green, this painting invites you
to explore the mysterious world of the ocean and discover its unique beauty.
